  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x76

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x60
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x40

          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 158x19
            text run at (0,0) width 158: "Dummy text. Dummy text."
        LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,20) size 784x20
          LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 473x19
            LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 473x19
              text run at (0,0) width 96: "Hover this text, "
              text run at (96,0) width 159: "then wait till it disappears. "
              text run at (255,0) width 218: "At that point there should be no red."
